Text:
Audio: AC3   2 Danish
Subs: Dutch Frenc English
English subs are tottally out of sync.

Alright, folks. It's not that the English subs are out of synch, it's that they are not of the movie itself. The subtitle tracks included in this rip are of the audio commentary and not of the film. They are not in the file anywhere and no information is available in the text files. Sorry, but unless you want to go dl the subtitles yourself, this one is a dud.

Oh, and it'll take you every bit of twelve hours to download it.

Just trying to save you some heartache.
